container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'nomination' else ''}

div.class: container container--small tab-pane fade in active

div.t-att-style: (not country or not country.state_ids) and 'display: none'

option.t-att-selected: s.id == ('state_id' in partner and country and partner['state_id'] != '' and int(partner['state_id']))

div.label: State / Province*

container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'nomination' else ''}

div.class: alert alert-info alert-dismissible rounded-0 fade show d-print-none css_editable_mode_hidden
